uk.gov.gchq.palisade.data.service.impl

Class SimpleDataService

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.gov.gchq.palisade.data.service.impl.SimpleDataService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataService, Service

    public class SimpleDataService
extends Object
implements DataService

    A SimpleDataService is a simple implementation of DataService that applies the required policy rules before returning data.

    It should only be used for examples/demos.

    It does not currently apply any validation of the ReadRequest, so users are able to request any data they want, which could be different to the original data they requested from Palisade.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public <T> CompletableFuture<ReadResponse<T>> read(ReadRequest request)
        Description copied from interface: DataService
        This method is used by the client code to request the data from the list of resources or a subset of the resources that the palisade service responded with in the DataRequestResponse. This method will only work if the client has already registered the data request with the palisade service.
        Specified by:
        read in interface DataService
        Type Parameters:
        T - The Java class of the format the data will be returned as.
        Parameters:
        request - The ReadRequest that came from registering the request with the palisade service. The request can be altered to contain only a subset of the resources to be read by this data service instance.
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture ReadResponse containing the stream of data in the expected format and/or a message (error/warning/info) to be returned to the client.
